about_me: I'm an experienced Frontend Developer, who is passionate about cutting-edge, pixel-perfect, beautiful interfaces and intuitively implemented UX. I develop web applications in React and not only.
siema_work: Development of web applications on React and Next.js for irrigation systems management.
evryka_work: Development of the corporate website of the company by Angular, and integration with the backend
exp_1: Collaborated with the development team to design and implement responsive and user-friendly web applications.

exp_3: Utilized HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create interactive and dynamic user interfaces.
exp_4: Integrated RESTful APIs to fetch and display data from backend services.
exp_5: Participated in code reviews and provided constructive feedback to fellow developers to maintain code quality and consistency.
exp_6: Assisted in debugging and troubleshooting frontend issues to ensure smooth user experiences.
exp_7: Worked closely with UX/UI designers to translate design mockups into functional web interfaces.
exp_8: Contributed to the continuous improvement of the development process by proposing and implementing new tools and best practices.
